thread.title: Kendall Jenner Struts Her Stuff in Strappy La Perla Lingerie
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner Struts Her Stuff in Strappy La Perla Lingerie

author: Celebuzz
title: Kendall Jenner Struts Her Stuff in Strappy La Perla Lingerie
text:
MORE >> 
Kendall Jenner rocks super-sexy La Perla lingerie in the brand’s Spring/Summer ’17 campaign. 
La Perla shared a video of Jenner strutting to the mirror wearing the Macramé Tale set, comprised of a bralette, Brazilian briefs, and a garter belt. She recently appeared in another Instagram snapshot from the campaign where she is wearing the same set and sipping on a cup of coffee. A post shared by LA PERLA (@laperlalingerie) on Mar 13, 2017 at 2:36pm PDT 6 Photos » 
Just a few days earlier, La Perla shared stills from Jenner’s Spring/Summer 2017 beachwear campaign. Below, Jenner is wearing the Summer Energy bikini with stylized starfish and colored plastic panels. 
A post shared by LA PERLA (@laperlalingerie) on Mar 17, 2017 at 7:20am PDT
